sense.def:
To guess something
pomeni dati odgovor ali mnenje o nečem, čeprav ne vemo, ali je pravilno.

seg.quote: She guessed that she was fifty yards from shore.
We can only guess at the number of deaths it has caused.
My salary is, I would guess, about half of yours.

sense.def:
To guess something
pomeni dati pravilen odgovor na problem ali vprašanje, čeprav prej nismo bili prepričani, ali je odgovor pravilen.

seg.quote: I had guessed the identity of her lover.

sense.def:
A guess
je poskus, da bi na nekaj pravilno odgovorili, čeprav ne vemo, kakšen je odgovor.

seg.quote: I don't know the name but I'll take a guess at it.
‘What's that?’—‘Some sort of blackbird, I guess.’
